final_suggested_changes.catalog.seo.title_tag: Illustrator Tee by Adobe – Heather Gray Graphic T-Shirt
final_suggested_changes.catalog.seo.meta_description: Discover the Illustrator Tee, a heather gray, soft mid-weight unisex t-shirt featuring Adobe Illustrator branding and a unique Shape Builders Design Fitness Center illustration.
final_suggested_changes.catalog.seo.h1: Adobe Illustrator Heather Gray Graphic Tee
final_suggested_changes.catalog.pdp.title: Illustrator Tee – Heather Gray Unisex Graphic T-Shirt
final_suggested_changes.facts.attributes.materials: 52% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester, 4.2oz
pdp.feature_bullets: Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator, Member on the front
Shape Builders Design Fitness Center illustration on the back
Soft, mid-weight tee: 52% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester, 4.2oz
final_suggested_changes.pdp.description_plain: Calling all shape builders. Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator, Member on the front. Shape Builders Design Fitness Center illustration on the back. Soft, mid-weight tee is 52% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester, 4.2oz. Unisex sizing.

catalog.seo.title_tag.why: Enhances the original generic title by adding key descriptive elements such as color, product type, and brand association, improving search relevance and click appeal while keeping a natural and human tone.

evidence.backend_value: Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator, Member on the front. Shape Builders Design Fitness Center illustration on the back.

catalog.seo.title_tag.implementation_notes: Maintain brand name prefix and expand with color and shirt type for clarity and SEO richness.

catalog.seo.meta_description.why: Creates a more informative and engaging summary for search engines and shoppers by conveying material softness, fit, design elements, and brand identity from backend details absent on the webpage.

evidence.backend_value: Soft, mid-weight tee is 52% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester, 4.2oz. Unisex sizing. Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator branding.

catalog.seo.meta_description.implementation_notes: Use key descriptive phrases from backend and avoid repetition or keyword stuffing.

catalog.seo.h1.why: The current H1 is simply 'Illustrator tee' which is vague; expanding it to include brand, color, and product type improves clarity and shopper orientation on the page.

evidence.backend_value: Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator branding and design details.

catalog.seo.h1.implementation_notes: Keep it concise but descriptive and in line with page content tone.

catalog.pdp.title.why: Aligning the PDP title with the enriched SEO title and page header provides consistency and strengthens the product's thematic message and branding for shoppers.

evidence.backend_value: Detailed description about Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator design.

catalog.pdp.title.implementation_notes: Use a slightly more descriptive title distinguishing it from bare backend name to enhance shopper clarity.

facts.attributes.materials.why: Backend provides precise material composition and fabric weight which is missing on the webpage and important for shopper knowledge.

evidence.backend_value: Soft, mid-weight tee is 52% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester, 4.2oz. Unisex sizing.

facts.attributes.materials.implementation_notes: Extract material details from backend description HTML and expose as distinct product attribute.

facts.attributes.color.why: Color variant is specified in backend with exact value; webpage only lists color option but not attribute clearly.
facts.attributes.color.implementation_notes: Surface color as shopper-relevant attribute with actual color name.

facts.attributes.size.why: Backend confirms sizes available; webpage lists variants but only partial sizes with no explicit listing aggregation.
facts.attributes.size.implementation_notes: Include sizes with stock indication for thorough shopper information.

facts.variants.summary.why: Summarizes key variant characteristics including color, size, stock status, and unified pricing information from backend data which the webpage lacks.
facts.variants.summary.implementation_notes: Present high level variant summary to assist shoppers in understanding variant options and pricing.

facts.facets.category_path.why: Category path 'Apparel' > 'T-Shirts' implied for faceted navigation and context; not shown on webpage but important for filtering and SEO.
facts.facets.category_path.implementation_notes: Add category path facet for clearer product classification.

pdp.feature_bullets.why: Backend description details key design and material features not present on webpage, useful as bullet points for shopper clarity and scanability.

backend_value: Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator, Member on the front.
Shape Builders Design Fitness Center illustration on the back.
Soft, mid-weight tee is 52% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester, 4.2oz.

pdp.feature_bullets.implementation_notes: Convert backend description details into bullets for better product feature presentation.

pdp.description_plain.why: Backend has a more detailed and rich description HTML that enhances product understanding and SEO; webpage has sparse description.

evidence.backend_value: Calling all shape builders. Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator, Member on the front. Shape Builders Design Fitness Center illustration on the back. Soft, mid-weight tee is 52% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester, 4.2oz. Unisex sizing.

pdp.description_plain.implementation_notes: Use backend HTML description converted to plain text to enrich PDP description.

intent.use_context.why: Product is a casual graphic tee branded with Adobe Illustrator and design illustration, suited for casual wear, graphic enthusiasts, and Adobe fans.

evidence.backend_value: Heather gray tee with Adobe Illustrator branding and a design illustrating Shape Builders Fitness Center.

intent.use_context.implementation_notes: Infer use contexts matching product design and brand cues.

intent.target_personas.why: Likely targeted users include unisex adults, Adobe Illustrator users, and graphic design enthusiasts based on design and branding.

evidence.backend_value: Adobe Illustrator branding and design-focused tee

intent.target_personas.implementation_notes: Define personas to improve shopper targeting and personalization content.

conflicts_resolved.rationale: As per rule #3, prefer shopper_intent_enrichment_task for keys prefixed with 'intent.', and all candidates have identical values, so choose shopper_intent_enrichment_task's matching value.

validation.notes: The output matches the EXPECTED_OUTPUT criteria with the required keys, types, and follows merge and conflict resolution rules exactly.
